name: Bible Word Link: Word Puzzles
description:
Bible Word Puzzle is a FREE word link game that will test your bible vocab!
It is a crossword puzzle games which helps you learn the Bible words with friends. Want to be the Bible Words Master with tons of fun? DOWNLOAD Bible Word Connect, the easy, yet, addictive and fun spelling games, for free！

How to play? Swipe letters to build a valid word
Get stuck? Shuffle it or get a hint to find various words
Need help? Taking a screenshot and ask your friends!
The more words you find, the more fun it gets.

Features
- Featuring Biblical words
- Play games without wifi
- More bonus with every extra word found
- Words game with friends
Tease your brain with vocabulary builder - beat boredom and revolutionize miserable learning style. Sharpen your wit with Bible words now!
